strategic_narrative.reasoning: Poor narrative development with no clear investment thesis. Report lacks strategic storyline and reads as disconnected data presentation without coherent investment rationale or compelling business case.
evidence: No clear investment thesis or strategic framework
Data presented without narrative context or storyline
Missing connection between company strategy and financial projections
Lacks compelling business case or investment rationale
improvement_suggestions: Develop clear investment thesis with supporting narrative
Create strategic storyline connecting business model to projections
Add compelling business case explaining investment opportunity
Transform data presentation into coherent investment story

analytical_rigor.reasoning: Basic analytical approach with minimal depth or insight. Limited use of analytical tools and superficial treatment of key investment factors. Analysis lacks sophistication expected for professional investment research.
evidence: Basic financial calculations without deeper analysis
No sensitivity analysis or scenario planning
Limited risk assessment or alternative viewpoints
Superficial treatment of key valuation drivers
improvement_suggestions: Add comprehensive sensitivity and scenario analysis
Include detailed risk assessment framework
Expand analytical depth with multiple valuation approaches
Provide deeper insight beyond basic calculations

industry_context.reasoning: Minimal industry context with limited understanding of competitive dynamics or market factors. Company analyzed largely in isolation without appropriate sector framework or competitive positioning.
evidence: Limited competitive landscape analysis
Missing industry trends and market dynamics
No regulatory or macro-economic context
Company evaluated without strategic industry framework
improvement_suggestions: Add comprehensive industry and competitive analysis
Include market dynamics and trend evaluation
Integrate regulatory environment considerations
Position company within broader industry context

professional_presentation.reasoning: Basic presentation with poor organization and limited visual elements. Difficult to follow structure with formatting issues that detract from analytical communication and professional credibility.
evidence: Poor section organization and unclear structure
Limited use of visual elements or charts
Formatting inconsistencies and readability issues
Unprofessional appearance that undermines credibility
improvement_suggestions: Improve overall structure and section organization
Add professional visual elements and charts
Enhance formatting consistency and readability
Create professional presentation standards

citation_discipline.reasoning: Poor citation discipline with many unsupported claims and limited evidence integration. Lacks proper attribution and fails to meet professional standards for investment research documentation.
evidence: Many claims lack proper supporting evidence
Limited source attribution and referencing
Poor integration of external evidence
Fails to meet professional citation standards
improvement_suggestions: Implement comprehensive citation system
Add proper source attribution for all claims
Integrate external evidence throughout analysis
Establish professional documentation standards

comparative_analysis: This report represents poor quality investment research with significant deficiencies across all dimensions. Falls well below professional standards expected for investment analysis, with particular weaknesses in strategic narrative and industry context. Requires comprehensive improvement to meet baseline professional standards.
recommendations: Complete restructuring around clear investment thesis and narrative
Add comprehensive analytical framework with scenario planning
Integrate detailed industry and competitive context throughout
Implement professional presentation and formatting standards
Establish rigorous evidence and citation discipline
